dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A listener from Atyrau Region just sent us a message asking about that earthquake on April 10th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A listener from Atyrau Region just sent us a message asking about that earthquake on April tenth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, the one at 1:40 AM, with a magnitude of 4.3.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, the one at one forty a m, with a magnitude of four point three.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a reminder, at 01:40 AM on April 10, Kazakh seismologists registered an earthquake with an epicenter located in Atyrau Region. The earthquake had a magnitude of 4.3 and an energy class of 9.1.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and get thisâ€”the Department of Emergency Situations there says they didn't even receive any information about it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and get this-the Department of Emergency Situations there says they didn't even receive any information about it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response to a request from a Tengrinews.kz correspondent, the Atyrau Region Emergency Department stated that they had not received any information about the earthquake.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, really? But the National Data Center definitely registered it, like, southeast of Kulsary, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, really? But the National Data Center definitely registered it, like, southeast of Kulsary, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Department of Emergency Situations of Atyrau Region has commented on the earthquake that, according to the Kazakhstan National Data Center, occurred during the night of April 10. The epicenter was 120 kilometers southeast of the city of Kulsary.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, about 120 kilometers away. It's uh, kind of strange they wouldn't have any reports.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, about one hundred twenty kilometers away. It's uh, kind of strange they wouldn't have any reports.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The epicenter was 120 kilometers southeast of the city of Kulsary.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, a 4.3 isn't massive, but it's not nothing either. You'd think someone would've felt it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, a four point three isn't massive, but it's not nothing either. You'd think someone would've felt it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And the energy class was 9.1, which is, you know, noticeable.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And the energy class was nine point one, which is, you know, noticeable.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The earthquake had a magnitude of 4.3 and an energy class of 9.1.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So the local emergency department is basically saying they have no record of it, despite the official data?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the local emergency department is basically saying they have no record of it, despite the official data?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response to a request from a Tengrinews.kz correspondent, the Atyrau Region Emergency Department stated that they had not received any information about the earthquake.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's what they told Tengrinews.kz, yeah. Makes you wonder about communication gaps.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's what they told the website, yeah. Makes you wonder about communication gaps.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response to a request from a Tengrinews.kz correspondent, the Atyrau Region Emergency Department stated that they had not received any information about the earthquake.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Or maybe it was just in a really remote area? Like, no people around to report shaking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or maybe it was just in a really remote area? Like, no people around to report shaking.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Could be. Still, you'd expect some kind of alert system to pick it up automatically.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Could be. Still, you'd expect some kind of alert system to pick it up automatically.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True. Well, hopefully it didn't cause any damage or anything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True. Well, hopefully it didn't cause any damage or anything.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Fingers crossed. But it's a good reminder that even with all our tech, things slip through.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fingers crossed. But it's a good reminder that even with all our tech, things slip through.
